title: Spatial FaceTime Engineer - Apple Vision Pro

Here, you’ll do more than join something — you’ll add something.
description: The Vision Pro Spatial FaceTime team is focused on building the Spatial FaceTime system experience on Apple's new visionOS platform. This team works on deeply integrating FaceTime & SharePlay on visionOS, as well as delivering the Spatial Personas experience that fosters real-time spatial collaboration and communication. As a member of our team you will help us in crafting future experiences that will delight, inspire and empower millions of people. We work mostly in Swift, RealityKit and SwiftUI to build both the 3D and 2D user interfaces and experiences for FaceTime on visionOS. Successful engineers will be prepared to work from the UI down to the networking, protocols and system integration layers.
key_qualifications: 3-6 years experience in software development. Track record of building and shipping complex and delightful applications or user-facing systems on consumer platforms (mobile/gaming/etc.). Experience in modern software engineering practices (Object-oriented programming, functional programming, declarative user interfaces, test driven-development, etc). Excellent communication skills; ability to collaborate successfully with peers from diverse experiences and backgrounds. Experience using Apple frameworks and technologies (such as UIKit, Swift, SwiftUI, RealityKit, Core Animation, AVFoundation). Ability to work and partner with cross functional teams/ stakeholders.
preferred_qualifications: Interest or proficiency in augmented reality, and/or virtual reality. Interest or proficiency in spatial design, UI/UX design, and UX for AR/VR experiences. Experience with 3D math/linear algebra, 3D graphics, game engines. Rendering performance optimization experience. Experience with Unix development, daemons, cross-process communication, etc. Experience developing Unity/VR/AR applications and building 3D user interfaces.
